Other Information.Test Conditions: Mass ratio of HRP digests/BSA protein/HRP protein = 1 : 1000 : 1000, w/w/w
Other Information.Additional Info: The material showed excellent size-exclusion ability for proteins with high molecular weights while capturing N-linked glycopeptides.

Other Information.Test Conditions: Mass ratio of HRP digests/BSA protein/HRP protein = 1 : 1000 : 1000, w/w/w
Other Information.Additional Info: BSA was excluded due to its large size compared to the pore size of the material.

Other Information.Test Conditions: Mass ratio of HRP digests/BSA protein/HRP protein = 1 : 1000 : 1000, w/w/w
Other Information.Additional Info: Intact HRP protein was excluded due to size, while HRP digests were captured.

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Detection limit: 0.1 fmol mL⁻¹, Binding capacity: 200 mg g⁻¹

Other Information.Additional Info: The material demonstrated an ultralow detection limit, perfect size-exclusion effect, and high binding capacity for N-linked glycopeptides.
